column1: '''''miq-''''' is a [[Qenya]] verb meaning "to kiss".<ref name=PE12>{{PE|12}}
[[Helge Fauskanger]] has suggested that the form ''miqu-'' (retaining the same meaning) could be valid [[Neo-Quenya]].<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]]
column2: "[http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/eng-quen.rtf English-Quenya Wordlist (Quettaparma Quenyanna)]" at [http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion] (accessed 25 June 2011)</ref>
